name: Modern Chaos
description:
Controls : up, down, left, right arrow of the keyboard. Spacebar to turn on/off the cubes. Nothing else.

A minute long doodle game about factory and boredom, with a bit of color. 

My participation in 24h for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. (I miss the submission date by 20 seconds so I'm not part of the official jam.) 

I made the game alone, all visual made by me, fx and music taken from a royalty-free site. I wanted to make the game in one hour, but I finish by pushing it always a bit further until it takes 24h.
